tool_description: Open Library API provides data about books, authors, and related information.
title: Open Library API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search results for books, authors, and more

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: The fields to get back from solr. Use '*' to get all fields

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort results by various facets such as 'new', 'old', 'random', etc.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The user's language as a two-letter (ISO 639-1) language code

api_list.name: Author
api_list.description: Retrieve an author and their works by author identifier
api_list.code:
import requests

url = f"https://openlibrary.org/authors/{author_id}.json"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": toolbench_rapidapi_key
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.name: J. K. Rowling
body.top_work: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

works.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
